title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in Pakistan 2024
yAxis: GDP growth compared to previous year
summary: In general GDP growth compared to previous year has fallen over the Year.
GDP growth compared to previous year is slightly decreasing from 2018 to 2019, slightly increasing from 2019 to 2022, and finally roughly constant from 2022 to 2024.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2018 and 2019.
The highest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 5.53 was reached at Year 2018
The lowest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 2.35 was reported at Year 2020
